mapper.select: select folloingnickName from follow where follower = #{value}
select followernickName from follow where folloing = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into follow(follower, followernickName, folloing, folloingnickName) values(#{follower}, #{followernickName}, #{folloing}, #{folloingnickName})
mapper.delete: delete from follow where follower=#{follower} and folloing = #{folloing}
